epoch

public void epoch(Population<java.lang.String> population)
Description copied from class: AbstractEvolutionStrategy
Evolves the given Population via mutation or crossover, reevaluates it, and performs any other processing.

Evolution proceeds as follows:

  1. Genomes are marked for death by the SurvivalFilter, but remain available for reproduction
  2. A number of children are produced equal to the number of genomes not surviving this generation
  3. The marked genomes are removed from the population and replaced by the children
  4. The population is evaluated
  5. The population's statis are updated and a report is made

Specified by:
epoch in interface EvolutionStrategy<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>
Overrides:
epoch in class AbstractEvolutionStrategy<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>
Parameters:
population - the collection of genomes to evolve for one generation
See Also:
EvolutionStrategy.epoch(Population)

initialize

public void initialize(Population<java.lang.String> population)
Description copied from class: AbstractEvolutionStrategy
Performs an initial evaluation and any pre-evolution processing on the given Population. This method is intended to be called once, before any evolution takes place.

Initialization proceeds as follows:

  1. The population is evaluated
  2. The population's statistics are updated and a report is made.

Specified by:
initialize in interface EvolutionStrategy<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>
Overrides:
initialize in class AbstractEvolutionStrategy<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>
Parameters:
population - the collection of genomes to initialize
See Also:
EvolutionStrategy.initialize(com.xtructure.xevolution.genetics.Population)

report

public void report(Population<java.lang.String> population)
Description copied from interface: EvolutionStrategy
Produces a report of the state of the given Population at the end of initialization or any epoch. If this EvolutionStrategy's output directory is non-null, then logs may be written there.

Specified by:
report in interface EvolutionStrategy<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>
Overrides:
report in class AbstractEvolutionStrategy<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>
Parameters:
population - the population whose statistics are being reported
